word_mean_info__list.difference: 泛指各种惩罚，诸如法律、父母、老师以及神的惩罚等。
一般指法律上的惩罚或体育运动比赛中的处罚。

bilingual.source: This method of punishment is too inhuman.
bilingual.target: 这种惩罚方式太非人了。
这个惩罚既严厉又不应得。
孩子们经常说谎以逃避惩罚。

bilingual.source: She felt that the punishment was unjust.
bilingual.target: 她觉得这个惩罚是不公正的。

bilingual.source: The prisoner was whipped as a form of punishment.
bilingual.target: 囚犯被鞭打作为一种惩罚。

bilingual.source: The punishment should be proportionate to the crime.
bilingual.target: 惩罚应该与犯罪成比例。

bilingual.source: The mark of Cain is a symbol of his punishment.
bilingual.target: 该隐的标记是他惩罚的象征。

bilingual.source: The deprival of freedom is a severe punishment.
bilingual.target: 剥夺自由是一种严厉的惩罚。

bilingual.source: The severity of the punishment was questioned by many.
bilingual.target: 许多人质疑惩罚的严重性。

bilingual.source: The school banned corporal punishment years ago.
bilingual.target: 学校多年前就禁止了肉体的惩罚。

yingyinNormal.zh: 你是说正惩罚[施加负面刺激]吧。

yingyinNormal.en: No punishment will be inflicted. And the same goes for the other Tributes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他将不受到任何惩罚，其他贡品也一样。

yingyinNormal.en: The punishment for witches, what is that? That's right. Death by fire.
yingyinNormal.zh: 女巫们要受的惩罚，是什么呢？对了，是被火烧死。

yingyinNormal.en: How many illegal jumps have you made? Just one. I'll accept the punishment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你做了几次非法穿越？只有一次，我接受惩罚。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm ready for my punishment. Whatever you and god think is fair.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我准备好接受惩罚了，无论你和上帝想怎么样，这都是合理的。

yingyinNormal.en: This is your punishment. You have to wear this every day so that you remember you're married. Gladly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是对你的惩罚，每天都要带着它，记得你是已婚女士。心甘情愿。

yingyinNormal.en: I thought, I hoped you might pardon them. Is pardon punishment? I wished you would spare them. Why would I do that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想我希望您能赦免他们。赦免是一种惩罚吗？我希望您能饶他们不死。我为什么要饶他们？

yingyinNormal.en: Chip! Chip! Oh, Lord! As punishment she transformed him into a hideous beast. And placed a powerful spell on the castle and all who lived there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当心！哦，上帝。为了惩罚王子女巫把他变成了一头丑陋的野兽，并且给整座城堡和里面的仆人也施加了强大的魔咒。

yingyinNormal.en: Anyway, I don't know if that's what you're looking for, but either way, you can be sure this life of mine is punishment enough for the things I've done.
yingyinNormal.zh: 总之，我不知道你是不是想我赎罪，但不管怎样 ，你大可放心，我这辈子已经因我所做的亏心事，受到了应有的惩罚。

yingyinNormal.en: The punishment for not paying your hotel bill in the UAE is jail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在阿联酋，不付酒店费也要进监狱的。

yingyinNormal.en: You must be a glutton for punishment. Now, Anna, can you make sure she leaves? Certainly, m'lady.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你肯定喜欢讨打，安娜，请确保她离开这里。没问题，小姐。

yingyinNormal.en: It's called crime and punishment, Bolton. Besides, proximity to the arts is cleansing for the soul.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这叫做“罪与罚”，伯顿, 况且亲近艺术可以洗涤灵魂。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 严重处罚；严厉惩罚；严厉处罚

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The French measures, however, rely too much on severe <highlight>punishment</highlight> to change a culture that still regards beauty as skin-deep — and bone-showing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，法国的措施过于依赖严厉的惩罚来改变一种仍然将美丽视为肤浅和露骨的文化。

examination_example.sentence: They have demonstrated that when companies get into trouble with the law, evidence of good character can win them a less costly <highlight>punishment</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们已经证明，当企业遇到法律问题时，自身良好品质的证据可以为企业赢得成本较低的惩罚。

examination_example.sentence: Either eliminating a labour-rights concern or increasing corporate giving results in fines that are 40% lower than the <highlight>punishment</highlight> for bribing foreign officials.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 消除一个重大劳动权利问题，或者增加企业的捐赠，都会使罚金比收买国外官员的企业一般所受的罚金要少40%。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: As a <highlight>punishment</highlight> for Prometheus' crime, the gods created Pandora and they gave her a box filled with evils and curses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了惩罚普罗米修斯的罪行，众神创造了潘多拉，并给了她一个装满邪恶和诅咒的盒子。

examination_example.sentence: Physical <highlight>punishment</highlight> is used much less by well-educated parents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 受过良好教育的父母很少体罚孩子。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 处罚；惩罚；刑罚；损害；受到的处罚；粗暴的待遇

word_family.mean: v. 处罚；惩罚；利用；粗暴地对待；使遭受严重打击

examination_example.sentence: According to the new law, drivers using their phones to take a photo or play a game take the most <highlight>punishment</highlight>!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据新法律，司机使用手机拍照或玩游戏受到的惩罚最多！

examination_example.sentence: As we all know, <highlight>punishment</highlight> and violence (暴力) seldom work and will never teach the children what the right way to act is.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 众所周知，惩罚与暴力很难奏效，也永远不会教孩子们什么是正确的行为方式。

examination_example.sentence: If they can't, they may have to pay as much as $1, 200 as a fine (罚款), or receive some other <highlight>punishment</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果他们做不到，他们可能要支付1200美元的罚款，或者遭受其他惩罚。
